attributes.additional_details: The people of the UK are watching Keir Starmer destroy their country single handily.
attributes.background: Change the leader of the Labour Party, reverse the tax hikes and stop locking people up for social media posts. We want him to pass the party leadership to someone less communist with immediate effect.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for elected representatives or public servants to resign or be removed from office.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.

You may wish to sign this petition:

Call a General Election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700143
